iti78:2.1: “Dhatuso, bhikkhave, satta sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti.
iti78:2.2: Hinadhimuttika satta hinadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti,
iti78:2.3: kalyanadhimuttika satta kalyanadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti.
iti78:3.1: Atitampi, bhikkhave, addhanam dhatusova satta sattehi saddhim samsandimsu samimsu.
iti78:3.2: Hinadhimuttika satta hinadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandimsu samimsu,
iti78:3.3: kalyanadhimuttika satta kalyanadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandimsu samimsu.
iti78:4.1: Anagatampi, bhikkhave, addhanam dhatusova satta sattehi saddhim samsandissanti samessanti.
iti78:4.2: Hinadhimuttika satta hinadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandissanti samessanti,
iti78:4.3: kalyanadhimuttika satta kalyanadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandissanti samessanti.
iti78:5.1: Etarahipi, bhikkhave, paccuppannam addhanam dhatusova satta sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti.
iti78:5.2: Hinadhimuttika satta hinadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti,
iti78:5.3: kalyanadhimuttika satta kalyanadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim samsandanti samenti”ti.
iti78:9.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
